values: 抑制，遏制；限制，阻止
To restrain someone or something means to use physical strength to stop them.
Mike restrained Allen from reaching the door.
v. to prevent from doing something 阻止
v. to keep under control 控制
vt. 抑制，控制；约束；制止
vt. 抑制，控制；约束；制止

vt. 抑制，遏制；管制，克制，约束

时 态:  
restrained，restraining，restrains 

形容词:  
restrainable

副 词:  
restrainedly

名 词:  
restrainer
v. 制止，阻止；克制，抑制；控制（某事物）；剥夺……的行动自由（或人身自由），管押；（安全带）缚住（人或其身体部位）
